CorrespondingContentIDs.@Core.Description: Correspondence between `Core.ContentID` in a parameter and in the return type of an action
CorrespondingContentIDs.@Core.LongDescription:
If values in the action invocation are annotated with `Core.ContentID`,
          the corresponding values returned by the action are annotated with the same `Core.ContentID`
          and can thus be referenced in subsequent requests within the same batch request.

CorrespondingContentID.@Core.Description: Establishes a correspondence between a value in a parameter and a value in the return type

ParameterValue.@Core.Description: Path to a value in a parameter that may be annotated with `Core.ContentID`

ReturnedValue.@Core.Description: Path to a value in the return type that will be annotated with the same `Core.ContentID`
